body:
Hey guys, just quickly saying that my very first skit has been uploaded to my channel and features myself and miningflamingo!

Thanks - OPTOBAT

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QFHXQ_bPYr4

title: Channel Skits (Real life video)

replies.body: Very nice, for a small youtuber like you that was some good editing :D
replies.body_tagged: Very nice, for a small youtuber like you that was some good editing :D

replies.body: What was that? XD nice video
replies.body_tagged: What was that? XD nice video

replies.body: omg, man i see you pointing out negative things about me ALL the time, why can't you just appreciate AT LEAST my effort to entertain the community, rather then being so rude?
replies.body_tagged: omg, man i see you pointing out negative things about me ALL the time, why can't you just appreciate AT LEAST my effort to entertain the community, rather then being so rude?

replies.body: haha thanks, the weird part was that we had to do a running scene, then stop, move the camera into a new position and do the running scene again for each angle lol XD
replies.body_tagged: haha thanks, the weird part was that we had to do a running scene, then stop, move the camera into a new position and do the running scene again for each angle lol XD

replies.body:
Thanks man, and the funny thing about the editing, i was saying to another reply, is that we actually ran that scene about 6 times!
Because there was only 2 of us interested in making the video, we had to run past the camera, stop, set up another angle and run again XD

replies.body:
He wasn't being rude at all. The media sub-forum was created only for Avicus related content.

Other then that, nice video!
